website_summaries.verdict: If you have always wanted to try a Casper mattress and don't need firm support, the Essential is a reasonably-priced option that offers the body-hugging comfort of durable memory foam construction.
pros: Provides comfort and mid-level support, thanks to the triple-layer foam build and open-cell technology
Comes with a zippered cover that protects the mattress and is easy to clean
Most affordable model by the brand, plus you get 100 nights to give it a try
cons: Thinner and less supportive than other Casper mattresses
Some consumers experienced increased pain in their backs and joints after sleeping on it

customer_reviews.title: What horrible smell!!?
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is perfect!!! I’ve read hundreds of reviews on mattresses and was a little uneasy when I read some on this particular one about a “horrible smell” that doesn’t go away. I decided to take a chance anyhow and I couldn’t be more happy with my purchase! There is absolutely no “horrible smell” and I’ve let it expand for a few hours now. Don’t believe everything you read people. Some folks just complain to complain! This mattress was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jacy

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 11” Not even 8”. False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 11” king. Not even 8”. Expanded to 7”. Not as advertised. Dont like companies that lie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused SERIOUS itching problems
customer_reviews.text: There is something deeply deeply wrong with this mattress. Others have mentioned the smell which I also experienced but did not care too much about (my sense of smell is rather poor, comparatively). But what made me write this review to STAY FAR AWAY from this mattress is the day I started using it, I started having serious itchiness all over my body. I Can't think of a single thing else that could have caused it, and it hasn't happened before using this mattress. STAY FAR AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Kendel Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Best sleeper ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable matress I've ever slept on. However I have had it a week and one corner still hasnt settled. I'm hoping it was just packed up to long and it settles soon, but even with that it still sleeps great. I dont wake up with my sore body aches anymore. I work in an automotive factory so I have a very physically demanding job. My body hurts when i get off work. When i wake up in the morning, I feel better than I ever have as far as my aches and pains. I cant believe a mattress can do all that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!! Not thick but not thin PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried buying this mattress just because I wanted something worth my money. It’s so comfortable and i have so much back and neck pain but this has truly reduced the pain. This mattress is totally worth it guys I can truly say that this is worth your money...
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: BUY DIRECTLY FROM THE MANUFACTURER INSTEAD
customer_reviews.text: This mattress holds heat because of the memory foam. My suggestion would be to buy directly from the manufacturer DO NOT BUY THIS ON AMAZON. You can have the Casper people pick up the mattress if you don’t like it when buy directly from them. If you make the mistake of buying it on amazon and you try to return it you’ll have to find a box for it and force your ups driver to pick it up instead. I had to cancel my return because I didn’t feel right making my ups man haul a queen size mattress into his truck. Instead I’ll opt for a cooling mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: So far not so great.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 2 days now and the mattress is completely lopsided. I read online that it could take time to expand, but this just seems wrong. I get the sense that the mattress cover is way too tight since it appears to be restricting the mattress from expanding. It’s also nowhere near 11inches even on the higher side. It’s more like 9.5 inches max. Thinking about returning the mattress...but a bit hesitant since it’s going to be a pain (there’s no way to get the mattress back in the box)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a Snorlax
customer_reviews.text: I’m a side sleeper and it’s perfect. Arrived quickly and on time. Molds to the body great, not too firm but just right. Breaking in nicely. Definitely 11” like advertised not sure what everyone else was saying they clearly don’t own a tape measure. Overall great value and great quality. I’m sleeping like a Snorlax. 10/10 would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: JonMaxwell

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mattress that didn't hurt the lower part of my back. I slept on the mattress for the first time last night and woke up twice with my lower back throbbing with pain. I put a 2 inch foam topper on it and it feels better. I was trying to find a mattress where I DIDN'T need a topper. Save your money and buy the more expensive one. I hear that's like a cloud, not like a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Re's Favorites

customer_reviews.title: Just bad product
customer_reviews.text: Smells very bad. Looks cheap. When you sleep on it, the corners blend up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your $ for better mattress
customer_reviews.text: It only expanded 7 inches , not 11''. Very disappointed. Mattress is very light . It took me 6 days to get use to mattress . It's soft mattress . If you are looking to replace mattress every 3-4 yr this is perfect for you . I rather invest in better mattress . Not worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to return this product from more than a month but UPS is saying they cannot pick the mattress because king size mattress is too big and UPS don't allow this dimension product for pick and drop service. Also, product quality is not good. My body shoulder pain and backache starts after using it. I appreciate if anyone from the customer service team helps me to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jamwal

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: So I don’t mind this mattress. It’s very comfortable, and the cover it comes with is nice. But I bought this product around Black Friday and it still has a chemical scent coming from it. I don’t understand. The info book that came with my mattress said the smell would dissipate with in a day. I recently found out about the harsh chemicals used in making memory foam mattress and I wonder if studies have been done about the long term effects of these chemicals. And if the are actually safe to breathe in. Because it still smells several months after it was purchased. Comfortable mattress but I am worried about it’s safety.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: It's like an air mattress when you crawl into bed the sides pop up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth foam home delivery mattress we have purchased over the last few years. All from different suppliers and at different price points. The mattress purchase before this was in July 2019. The Casper is more expensive but is well worth it. Firm support all to the way to the mattress edge when you sit on the mattress with legs and feet off. No stiffness in the morning as we have experienced before on other foam mattresses. An excellent product and one I am recommending to my friends and families.
customer_reviews.author: kcc

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps hot
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made mattress that perfect firmness for me and I prefer feeling firm support which it offers. I slept well on this mattress but here’s the thing... unless you’re very very cold blooded person this mattress traps HEAT and you will awake hot 🥵. Otherwise it’s fine mattress. personally I like to be on cool side while asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Tea lover

customer_reviews.title: No sinking, and no bad smell
customer_reviews.text: So I read most of the reports, and was scared but did eventually make the purchase. I smell nothing significant on the mattress so I do not understand what others complained about. I chose this mattress because it felt strong and one shouldn’t sink in it, so I was extra worried when I read had issues with this. I did not experience and sinking and can only imagine why it happened to other folks. This is a great mattress and I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my guest room to replace an old rattan couch that I slept on often. Had developed bursitis in my hip severe enough to send me to three months of physical therapy. After the first night sleeping on my Casper, my hip pain was noticeably improved. Two weeks of sleeping on the Casper and I am able to stop the therapy. The support it provides has been a huge boost to my therapy and I love it so much I am ordering the queen size to replace our bed (so I can join my husband again!). I didn't think our bed was really uncomfortable until I got the Casper. Excellent mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: I did not understand this was a foam mattress my husband and I are over 65 and have back issues we tried sleeping in it but we were not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: Good support for average person, some chemical smell but after 2 days gone, nice cover and washable. I would add a non-slip surface to the underside of cover, because if you don't have the mattress completely framed in on all 4 sides it slides off the bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: This arrived on porch not even in a Casper box
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if this was a used item returned but it arrived wrapped in plastic on. my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: Consumer reports rated it as the best and they weren’t wrong. Love this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: deborah weischedel

customer_reviews.title: Maybe too comfortable?
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronic insomnia since my teens. I tried a waterbed. I tried an air bed. Then I bought my wife a Lull mattress for her bed. She really liked it. I liked it too. I was considering buying one for my bed and then I saw this on sale. It was great from the first night. I didn't need an adjustment period. This has been some of the best sleep of my life. So, why do I say it may be too comfortable? Well, when I lay down to read, I invariably fall asleep. And, even if I was planning to take a nap, I end up napping longer than I planned. I highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesyboy

customer_reviews.title: 8in and not that promising
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for almost 5months now. So there is some credibility when I say the mattress is 8in only and not 11in. Also, I bought this mattress because it looked promising from the description and back of the mind I knew I can return it if I don't like it in 100 days. But, the real feeling kicks in after 101 days to be honest. After using it for a while, I have started to get back issues. I feel after few days the memory foam is not firm enough and tends to sink in causing deformation in the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kajol

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Casper bed becuz i had slept on one at a friend's home and realized my shoulder did not hurt in the morning! becuz i am a "side" sleeper, my shoulder is sore in the morning. i'm realizing it has taken a few weeks to realize the benefits from the Casper mattress but now my shoulder is no longer sore. The mattress is incredibly comfortable and i'm very happy i bought it!
customer_reviews.author: cobrien

customer_reviews.title: still smells BAD 5 month later
customer_reviews.text: more comfortable than my last mattress was after 9 years, still have back pain after waking up though, but the smell is atrocious
customer_reviews.author: Nate Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is great!  I’m just old..
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with my mattress even though it’s a bit firm. I awake with shoulder pain but it may be related to my previous rotator cuff repairs. I would buy the Casper for sure but maybe a slightly softer version.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great value but slightly too firm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after returning a Puffy mattress. I was furious with Puffy’s customer service and false promises so I decided to go with a Casper. The Calder is much firmer than the Puffy mattress. It is also a lot heavier. I can tell they use better material for the base. However, it doesn’t have that same soft sink in feel like the puffy mattress. Overall, I still gave it 4 out of 5 stars because for the value and price, you’re paying almost half the cost for almost the same thing. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ngo Family

customer_reviews.title: Comfy mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this mattress. I could just manage to get it onto my bedframe and unwrap it by myself. I expanded to the full thickness promised. It is better quality than generic brand mattresses. You get what you pay for and this was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MLou365

customer_reviews.title: Not firm
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is basically like any mattress you can buy in any mattress store - it is semi squishy and not firm. I have yet to find anything that is firm and stays firm other than the sleep number beds. If you are looking for a firm bed that provides the proper level of support - the Casper isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: P.L.. Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: After 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Have this for more than 10 months now. It is a little soft compare with my old traditional mattress. I hope there is something I can add on to the top to keep it more firm. Firmness is each preference, that is the hardest part getting the mattress. When I get it, I feel OK. But after months of sleeping, I feel different. I don't think the mattress change, it is just my body feel different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Ever
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a medium-firm innerspring mattress and are so glad we did! The consumer magazine review is right! Very comfortable for a 6’1” 225# side sleeper and a 5’5” 135# back sleeper. Isolates movement very well and zero trouble with being too warm. We’re planning on a second one for our guest room.
customer_reviews.author: TSS

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, great sleep
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant on buying based on reviews, but had heard other good things about Casper, so I decided to give it a try. Don’t use with a box spring and am nowhere near touching the wooden panels of my bed when I sit or lay on the mattress. Sleep well on it and don’t think it’s too firm. Probably an 8/10 on the firmness scale with 10 being a very firm mattress. Definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable mattress I've ever had. I didn't notice the smell that others have described. I don't want to ever leave the comfort of my bed again!!! I also appreciated the ease of getting this mattress up 3 narrow flights of stairs. Best mattress I could've hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Everyone’s body is different. So a mattress specificity is complicated at times. This is my first new mattress in years. I was skeptical about a bed-in-Box, but nonetheless curious. Casper is amazing. It’s not a memory foam or mattress, it’s... “Casper”. It’s exceptional. From hip and back pain, to size, to quality. It’s all 5 star. I haven’t had a good nights sleep in years. Casper solves that problem. I’ve only had a short time, but my sleep has been great. Thanks Casper.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: This Mattress is Very Firm...
customer_reviews.text: I hesitate to give this mattress a poor review. Functionally, it works fine. I didn't notice a bad smell and the mattress was fine right out of the box. However, I do think consumers should be aware that the mattress is very firm, so much so that it is pretty uncomfortable. I'm okay with a firm mattress, but this has very little give. Fortunately, I had a 2 inch mattress topper, and that makes it much more comfortable. Still, I expected more for spending $600 and with the great word of mouth that Casper enjoys. The mattress I bought years ago on Amazon for ~$300 was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: In love with this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We are on day 97 of our 100 day trial but we decided 67 days ago that we were keeping this mattress. We both wake up with no more shoulder aches (me) or neck aches (him). This mattress is comfortable, provides deep sleep, and is the best investment we could’ve made. Our bed is now TOO comfortable! Almost every night when we climb into bed one of us says, “OH MY, this bed is so comfy!” Thanks Casper!
customer_reviews.author: Erica (eLeMeNO-P Kids)

customer_reviews.title: Nice and firm for an arthritic spine
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike in this mattress--except that I did not wait for Amazon Prime Day Pricing of 20% off!! But I was desperate for a decent night's sleep. Unpacking it was a breeze- we slid it out of the box onto the platform bed, and let it expand. There was only the very slightest of odors emitting from it. First night, I tossed and turned a little. Second night, slept 5 hrs solid without moving! It is easier to turn over on this mattress. Side sleeping is a joy. Nothing else to say, except it is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: VVV

customer_reviews.title: Equal to the best conventional mattress
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd have to pay $2000+ for a mattress this comfortable. I'm 6', over 225#, 64 years old with a bad back. I sleep front, side, back all night without waking up once, and so does my wife. We live in an rv, the mattress is on a slab of plywood. Equal to the expensive Sealy on an expensive foundation at our regular home. I can't say enough about how much we like this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated hip pain
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having hip pain every night, would toss and turn, and get only a few hours sleep. With this mattress, he is sleeping for the whole night and waking with no hip pain. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for back pain relief, not so much
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft, I saw lots of people that said this is firmer than the 2019 model which I was excited for as I have back problems and need a very firm mattress. I'm still waking up and tossing and turning because my back hurts. They say it takes your body a while to adjust to a new mattress, I'm hoping my bank pain goes away or I'll be sending this mattress away
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: No bad smell, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I saw in the past reviews there was a strong smell but I did not have this issue, easy set up, is true to size( I got a queen), and is the most comfortable bed I’ve ever laid down on it feels better then a temperpedic! Doesn’t sink! I also saw a few people say this is not for side sleepers but I slept on my side perfectly comfortable I honestly have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Alexys

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit particular when it comes to selecting a bed. I don't like it too soft or too firm which can sometimes be a problem. I have read many reviews on this bed and so I ordered one to see if it was the right one for me. The bed is perfect, it molds to my body and it is very comfortable. I am very happy i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: mabes13

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if possible
customer_reviews.text: I really a don’t enjoy this mattress. It’s comfortable at first but sleeping on it is a chore. Weirdly firm with no support. I would love to return it but it’s impossible to fold it back up in the box. Finally can get some sleep after adding a mattress topper, but it’s still not good sleep. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harder than expected
customer_reviews.text: It came out of the box and inflated straight away ready for immediate use. Wonderful. (The instructions are useless.) There is a lot of competition at this price point and while the quality and price (for 11") is excellent, it is much firmer than expected. This may be want you want, especially if you have back problems. But this is not apparent from the description. From reading other reviews, once inflated it is not straightforward to return. Amazon says yes, but you would be advised to check. The 3* is because I expected a mattress with more give and once inflated could not be bothered with the return process. It may suit you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Very Perfect!!!! 👍🏼👏🏼
customer_reviews.text: Perfect feel, fit and elegant presentation!!! Fits my Queen sheets like a glove!!! I’m so excited about the quality, packaging and deliver!!
customer_reviews.author: LilMex55

customer_reviews.title: Finally....support
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a pillow top mattress. Didn't like the "squishy" feel. The Casper supports the body. If I start out on my back and roll to one side or another, the mattress conforms to my body. Not me conforming to the mattress. And it's a lot easier to change the sheets because it is not so heavy. But I'd still like a person for that!!! Didn't check the pain relief box because that was not one of the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: CON: Horrible plastic stink for months on end. PRO: Delivery was very good. The bed was easy to install since it is just a deflated mattress. Throw it on the bed frame (need frame for platform bed or have your own box spring), open the plastic covering and remove. Bed recovers its shape promptly. Came with a cover. My wife found it to be smelly but comfortable. Now that the smell is gone it's just comfortable as far as she is concerned. I find it not so comfortable - must be me.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Writes

customer_reviews.title: Great bed in a box
customer_reviews.text: I really like the convenience of the bed in the box. And this bed is much more comfortable than the comparable Nectar mattress. I used to dislike sleeping on my wife's Nectar mattress, so I was skeptical of getting a bed in a box, but this thing is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Zinner

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I thought this mattress would be great. I had another brand of platform mattress before and it felt really great. But this one is aweful and I think that's why it was on sale. I have severe back pain issues and this matress did absolutely nothing to help. I had been sleeping on an air mattress for 2 years, and it felt just like the air mattress. I will be contacting Casper to figure out how I can return a mattress that won't fit back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Treat yo self, this is your sleep we’re talking about!
customer_reviews.text: First time getting my own mattress. It’s crazy that I’ve spent most of my life not treating myself to a good bed. Only 500ish and I’m definitely keeping this for 10 years. 50$ a year, that’s 365 days for good nights sleep. Best thing I’ve bought for myself in a long time. Best investment I’ve made towards myself
customer_reviews.author: William Wu

customer_reviews.title: Casper sleep essentials
customer_reviews.text: Quality and comfort are good. Make sure you really want the 12 inch mattress instead of 8 inch. It sits high on the frame. Still have back issues but have some relief
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Casper Element
customer_reviews.text: Best sleep I have gotten in a very long time. Very easy to unbox and since it's vacuum packed, it takes no time to become the best mattress I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Very firm and hurts to sleep on.
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this bed. Its painful hard as a stiff board. Not for side, back or stomach sleepers. I bought at least three extra top padding’s from different companies to try to make it softer. Nothing helped. Unless you like a really firm bed this is not the bed for you.
customer_reviews.author: ACG

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with support
customer_reviews.text: I already have a mattress like this casper in my master bedroom. When I saw the price I ordered another one for my guest bedroom. I havent put it on the frame yet, but i will this weekend. They are so comfortable i fall right to sleep. Pluss i never wake up all stuff and achy. Love Casper
customer_reviews.author: Toni Toth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and favorite mattress we’ve ever had. We’ve got two
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter finally got a more grown up room and this mattress was part of it. Honestly he mood and attitude have been better leading me to believe she’s sleeping more soundly. I have an original Casper and hers might actually be a little more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vash

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE FOR THE FIRST FEW MOUNTS
customer_reviews.text: THE EDGE NOW GIVES WAY. I SIT ON THE EDGE OF THE BED ALOT, NOW WHILE I AM SLEEPING AND ROLL OVER TO THE SIDE OF THE BED, IT FEELS LIKE I AM GOING TO FALL OFF, THE MATTRESS SAGS ENOUGH TO MAKE ME FEEL UN-EASY., THE MIDDLE OF THE BED IS STILL COMFORTABLE...
customer_reviews.author: Richard G Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 4 stars because because after 8 months, the chemical smell is still there. It is not overpowering, but the smell is strong enough that it transfers to your sheets and blankets as well. Otherwise it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erik s. anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and high quality mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable but also very high quality and comfortable mattress. Purchased this for guest room- mattress was ready to be used quickly after came out of box. We had set up for about a week before was used but didn’t need that much time to relax from box. Our guests commented was very comfortable. Very good price too. Would purchase this mattress again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: karen Jaeger-Muehl

customer_reviews.title: Couple month review
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. My husband has had a harder time adjusting to the firmness that it has, we use to have an extremely soft bed. I would recommend it to a friend. It fully inflated within a day and no odor. We have used it for a couple months now and it’s holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on my Casper Matress for 4 months now and I absolutely love it. For me it's the perfect combination of firm and soft to relieve aches and pains, yet support the spine. I hope it holds up for several years!
customer_reviews.author: PirateMama777

customer_reviews.title: easy buy - great confort
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you can order a great mattress in a box! Quick delivery, easy to unpack. Heavy to bring up. I just had to bring it up 1 floor but I could have used a hand to be fair.... The mattress is super comfortable and was ready to use in 10min after it came to its full size. No plastic smell from the packaging. Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amélie Vanmaele

customer_reviews.title: Too HOT too soft!
customer_reviews.text: I was all excited to get this bed for my wife and I. It is extremely easy set up. But holy cow this matress is HOT! It's like being in a sweat lodge! It also doesn't have the support I need.. too squishy!! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A. Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Excited to sleep on this!!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect!! It became GINORMOUS as soon as we opened it, and NO CHEMICAL SMELL!! Iblaud on it, and I'm excited for bed time!! Thank you for such a great price, and quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Odom

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have a Casper!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just my honest review. Everyone needs to be sleeping on a Casper. Period!!! Nothing better than having some great sleep. Wake up feeling like a champ. All my rooms have a Casper. My son (5Y) loves his and sleeps very well.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL SANCHEZ

customer_reviews.title: Immediate comfort
customer_reviews.text: First got one for our son and then ordered a second for our daughter they absolutely love this mattress and it’s immediate comfort
customer_reviews.author: jay lema

customer_reviews.title: great kid mattress
customer_reviews.text: After a ton of research, I bought two of these, one for each of my children. One arrived yesterday and one arrived today. They love their new mattresses! They're very comfortable- like a medium plush, I'd say. They don't melt into it completely but it does have some softness and give. Time will tell of course but, for now, I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: C.ONeill

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am satisfied with the quality, & build of the mattress. I find it great to have the option to remove the cover & wash it. After you take it out of the wrap, give it a moment to rise & it’ll be ready to sleep on. No long wait times.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkay Fly

customer_reviews.title: Sleep easy
customer_reviews.text: Ummmmm.... YES! If you like a hard mattress, this is quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: casper mattress
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and soft. did not fit the fitted sheet i have but that was a sizing error on my part, i didn't take into account that it would be thicker than my old mattress. overall i am very happy with it.
